nodes.text: Destra was one of two moons that orbited the Outer Rim planet Batuu in the Batuu system of the Trilon sector. It was not visible from Black Spire Outpost, the planet's largest settlement.

Destra was first introduced as part of the backstory for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, a theme park land that opened to guests in Disneyland on May 31, 2019 and in Disney's Hollywood Studios on August 29, 2019.
